name: Sweet Potato Puree
keywords: fall, heavy cream, pecan, sweet potato, side dish
recipeIngredient: 6 large or 8 to 10 medium sweet potatoes, baked (about 8 pounds)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Peel and mash sweet potatoes. In a bowl, combine them with butter, cream, eggs, cinnamon, vanilla, salt and 1/2 cup pecans. Blend thoroughly.
Place mixture in a casserole; top with remaining pecans. Bake 30 minutes. (Purée may be made a day ahead and refrigerated; return to room temperature and bake).
